Les sorciers de Waverly Place France
Die Zauberer vom Waverly Place Germany
Disney Die Zauberer vom Waverly Place Germany

1.title: Alex Tells the World
1.plot: After the government has taken all the wizards away, Alex decides to reveal wizards to the world. The rest of the wizarding world doesn't exactly take well to it.

2.title: Alex Gives Up
2.plot: Alex (Selena Gomez) quits her wizard training after she decides there will never be enough time to regain her status and compete for the title of family wizard. However, she is shocked to learn that, as a mortal, she will no longer be able to date Mason (Gregg Sulkin). Meanwhile, after meeting with the Wizard Family Competition Commissioner, Justin (David Henrie) decides to tutor delinquent wizards and do whatever it takes to get himself back in the running for the wizard competition. And a family of Cucuys, Latino mythical monsters, invites the Russos for an evening ...

3.title: Lucky Charmed
3.plot: Harper tries convincing Alex that life without magic isn't so bad, but the strain of taking responsibility for her actions instead of using magic causes a disagreement between the two best friends. Meanwhile, after Jerry finds the family heirloom wizard robe in shambles, he tries to get to the bottom of how it was destroyed.

4.title: Journey to the Center of Mason
4.plot: Dean comes back and wants to get back together with Alex. Mason gets jealous and eats Dean. Alex, Max and Justin must go inside Masons body to get Dean out.

5.title: Three Maxes and a Little Lady
5.plot: Jerry convinces Max to join a Sophisticated Wizard's Club.

6.title: Daddy's Little Girl
6.plot: Alex is jealous that Jerry is giving so much attention to Maxine!

7.title: Everything's Rosie for Justin
7.plot: A new student, Rosie, joins Justin's class.

8.title: Dancing with Angels
8.plot: Rosie takes Justin, Harper and Alex to an angel dance club in the Hollywood sign. Alex, Harper and Justin pretend to be angels to get in.

9.title: Wizards vs. Angels
9.plot: Tina reveals Rosie is not who she says she is.

10.title: Back to Max
10.plot: Harper performs at the Spirit of America play.

11.title: Zeke Finds Out
11.plot: Zeke seeks magic as a new hobby, and when Alex impulsively and secretly assists in one of his routines, he begins to suspect that he himself might be a wizard, and confides in Harper about this, forcing her to convince Alex to either expose the truth about wizardry to him, or she will.

12.title: Magic Unmasked
12.plot: Alex discovers that she is the reason her favorite wrestler retired.

13.title: Meet the Werewolves
13.plot: Alex goes to meet Mason's parents, but discovers Mason has been telling his parents she's a werewolf. Max turns his parents into 4-year-olds.

14.title: Beast Tamer
14.plot: The kids win tickets to an upcoming Beast Taming event in the Wizard World!

15.title: Wizard of the Year
15.plot: Paparazzi snap Alex's former crush congratulating her.

16.title: Misfortune at the Beach
16.plot: Alex agrees to let her fortune out for a day at the beach.

17.title: Wizards vs. Asteroid
17.plot: Alex, Justin and Max choose to use their magic to blast an asteroid.

18.title: Justin's Back In
18.plot: Alex helps Justin prepare his students.

19.title: Alex the Puppetmaster
19.plot: Alex and Harper decide to do a puppet show to raise money for a new apartment and Zeke and Justin help them. But Alex forgets to write the lines for the show. Harper gets mad and decides to do a show of her own and makes her puppets act like the way Alex treats her. Alex makes Justin and Zeke puppets for her show and steals Harper's crowd which makes Harper upset. Then Alex apologizes to Harper using the puppets. Meanwhile, Talia's parents meet Theresa and Jerry for the first time, but it does not go well. Justin puts a spell on Talia's parents to forget they ever ...

20.title: My Two Harpers
20.plot: Alex uses magic to create a Harper clone to hang out with.

21.title: Wizards of Apartment 13B
21.plot: Alex and Harper move into an apartment building with a secret floor.

22.title: Ghost Roommate
22.plot: Alex and Harper take in a ghost roommate named Lucy to help pay the rent.

23.title: Get Along, Little Zombie
23.plot: Mr. Laritate stumbles upon the secret 13th floor.

24.title: Wizards vs. Everything
24.plot: Alex, Justin and Max must use their wizard powers together to defeat Gorog.

25.title: Rock Around the Clock
25.plot: The Russos may lose the Sub Station.

26.title: Harperella
26.plot: Harper is transported into a Cinderella-like world.

27.title: Who Will Be the Family Wizard?
27.plot: The Russo siblings -- Justin, Alex and Max -- face a sudden and ultimate test to determine which one of them will be entitled to keep their wizardly powers.

1.title: The Crazy 10 Minute Sale
1.plot: Alex Russo is a wizard in training along with her older brother Justin, and younger brother Max. Today, she is determined to take a break from her lessons and go shopping with her best friend Harper.

2.title: First Kiss
2.plot: Alex uses a spell to reverse time so Justin's first kiss is not a disaster. The voice of the NY Mets wants to use Max's sandwich for the official Met sandwich, unfortunately he cannot remember how he made it.

3.title: I Almost Drowned in a Chocolate Fountain
3.plot: Alex uses a pocket elf to pass Spanish. Justin and Max play a trick on Alex.

4.title: New Employee
4.plot: To spend more time with Harper, Alex coerces her parents to hire her as an extra waitress at the Waverly Sub-Station. But when she finds out how poorly her best friend does on the job, she puts an ancient spell on her that transforms her into a superior serving wench, and ends up making her too good. Meanwhile Justin's tutoring is interrupted by a young extortionist.

5.title: Disenchanted Evening
5.plot: Alex is mad she cannot use magic anytime. She finds out one of her classmates is a wizard and has no restrictions on his use of magic. She invites him and his parents over to convince hers, but learns he has a secret.

6.title: You Can't Always Get What You Carpet
6.plot: Alex goes to Justin for help when her flying carpet lesson with her father go badly.

7.title: Alex's Choice
7.plot: Alex is suspicious when Gigi invites Harper to a Tea party. When she learns it is a trick she must use magic to save her. Justin and Alex play a prank with wizard mail that is taken seriously.

8.title: Curb Your Dragon
8.plot: Alex buys Justin a dragon-dog, but when it is stolen Justin, Alex, and Max must crash dog show to get it back.

9.title: Movies
9.plot: When Alex learns Justin's new friends are cool she wants to hang out with them, must to Justin's dismay. Alex's attempt at getting into an R rated move puts her into the horror flick with only Justin to rescue her

10.title: Pop Me and We Both Go Down
10.plot: Justin's date with the hot new older girl is threatened by a zit that Alex compounds by making it come to life.

11.title: Potion Commotion
11.plot: Alex uses a love potion to get a date. Justin competes for a spot at the world school summit.

12.title: Little Sister
12.plot: Tired of being compared with Justin, Alex makes a wish on a genie to end the comparisons. Her wish is granted, but not in a way she expected.

13.title: Wizard School: Part 1
13.plot: When Alex is caught using magic to clean her room she is forced to go to wizard school with Justin. Max and Jerry camp out on the terrace to prove their manhood.

14.title: Wizard School: Part 2
14.plot: When Alex uncovers an evil plot she must use that knowledge to save Justin.

15.title: The Supernatural
15.plot: Justin uses magic on himself to impress a girl, which lands him a spot on his school's baseball team. Alex tries to use the situation to her advantage.

16.title: Alex in the Middle
16.plot: Alex convinces her parents to let her Uncle teach her magic, since he was the one who won the wizard's contest in the family. But things do not go as well as she hoped. A family secret is revealed.

17.title: Report Card
17.plot: It's wizard report card time, and Alex isn't doing at all well and needs to have her card signed by her parents. She tries to hide it from them, but when she can no longer hide it, she panics and transforms her parents into guinea pigs and loses them. Worst of all, the Russo siblings' Wizarding Professor is on his way to talk to her parents.

18.title: Credit Check
18.plot: Alex takes on an internship with a top Fashion Magazine.

19.title: Alex's Spring Fling
19.plot: In an attempt to make Riley jealous, Alex brings a mannequin to life.

20.title: Quinceanera
20.plot: The young wizards learn a body switching spell. Alex turns 15, time for a big celebration, her non-magical maternal grandmother comes for the party. Alex does not understand why the party is such a big deal and uses the body switch on her mother.

21.title: Art Museum Piece
21.plot: Alex wants to do well in art history without any work, so on a school trip to the art museum she brings historical paintings to life to help her. Meanwhile Jerry and Max find a way to play football in the house which doesn't turn out well.

1.title: Smarty Pants
1.plot: Alex and Harper enter an academic contest, for which Alex wears a pair of "smarty pants" that gives her all the answers, without any regard for Harper. Elsewhere, Max starts a water bottle business at school.

2.title: Beware Wolf
2.plot: Justin meets a girl on the World Wide Wiz-Web who seems nice enough... except that she's a werewolf.

3.title: Graphic Novel
3.plot: Justin and Max steal Alex's diary only to have it stolen again by Gigi, Alex's arch nemesis. In an attempt to recover the diary, the brothers accidentally place Gigi inside the book and into Alex's secret fairy-tale princess world.

4.title: Racing
4.plot: In an effort to spend time with Dean so she can talk him into becoming her permanent boyfriend, Alex invites him to the Russo family basement/garage to help fix an old car that Jerry never had time to take care of and enter it in a race in New Jersey. However, he proves to be so good he ends up gaining the admiration of the rest of the Russo family, especially Jerry, which hinders her plans for alone time with him. Meanwhile, Justin taunts Max for his recent purchases of suspicious items from the World Wide Wiz-Web, some of which turn out to work, even if they don't ...

5.title: Alex's Brother Maximan
5.plot: Failing to get his kids to work together on a spell, Jerry tells Max about an apparent spree of delicatessen robberies that prompts him to become Lower Manhattan's newest superhero; Maximan.

6.title: Saving Wiz Tech: Part 1
6.plot: Wiz Tech is temporarily closed and students are housed in the real world.

7.title: Saving Wiz Tech: Part 2
7.plot: Max has joined Professor Crumbs at Wiz Tech.

8.title: Harper Knows
8.plot: The Russo family is assigned to a popular convention to be on the lookout for rogue wizards who use magic to stir up trouble. But when Alex and her brothers go to the convention on a special assignment, Harper is along for the ride for the costumes. Alex is starting to feel compelled to reveal to Harper just who she really is.

9.title: Taxi Dance
9.plot: When word that the taxicab she was born in is being prepared for the scrap yard, Alex uses magic to try to restore it and does a better job of it than she expected... according to the cab.

10.title: Baby Cupid
10.plot: Fearing that her parents might break up on their anniversary, Alex orders Cupid from the world-wide wiz-web. The trouble is, the couple he ends up bringing together turns out to be... of all people, Justin and Harper!

11.title: Make It Happen
11.plot: A guidance counselor from the Wizard World is sent to advise the Russo kids on alternate career plans in case they fail their wizard training. After much arguing between Justin & Alex, they decide to form a two-person rock band, a la The White Stripes, and prove to be quite the duo. Max decides that his alternate plan is to be a magician, and proves to be just as good as his older siblings, if not better.

12.title: Fairy Tale
12.plot: Justin casts Harper to play Tinkerbell in the school production.

13.title: Fashion Week
13.plot: Harper helps Mr. Frenchy during Fashion Week and enlists Alex's help.

14.title: Helping Hand
14.plot: Justin invents a "helping hand" with which to help the elderly, but Alex steals it to use for herself.

15.title: Art Teacher
15.plot: Alex finds out that her favorite teacher, Miss Jennifer Majorhealy, is in reality a 16-year-old girl who was transformed into an adult by TJ Taylor(See episode #1.5, "Disenchanted Evening"). When she sprinkles her with undo dust and changes her back, she puts the entire art program at risk of being cut. Max makes up a fake disease to get out of a class, but ends up also getting the attention of a girl he likes, as well as two celebrities.

16.title: Future Harper
16.plot: The Russo siblings learn of their secret being exposed by a popular author via her novels, but when they go through the Inter-Wizard People Porter to confront her, they make a shocking discovery.

17.title: Alex Does Good
17.plot: The school principal enrolls Alex in the Sunshine Club.

18.title: Hugh's Not Normous
18.plot: Upon facing the realization that he was never the giant he believed himself to be, Hugh Normous runs away from home... to the Russos.

19.title: Don't Rain on Justin's Parade - Earth
19.plot: The desire to keep his favorite weatherman from being fired prompts Justin to get him to call for outlandish forecasts that he makes come true, and brings Mother Nature herself to take her anger out on him.

20.title: Family Game Night
20.plot: Alex switches brains with Harper for test, but Alex has trouble switching them back. Justin gets a girlfriend, and tries to figure a way to break up with her. Family Game night at the Russo's.

21.title: Justin's New Girlfriend
21.plot: A shared interest in silent movies is bringing Justin and Harper closer together, much to the delight of Harper, and the chagrin of Alex.

22.title: My Tutor, Tutor
22.plot: Jerry hires a tutor named Tutor to help Max pass a test at school!

23.title: Paint by Committee
23.plot: Alex is commissioned to paint the school mural.

24.title: Wizard for a Day
24.plot: Alex gives her dad a Merlin's hat with unlimited wishes for his birthday.

25.title: Cast-Away (to Another Show)
25.plot: Justin wins an essay contest that allows him to go on the S.S. Tipton and meet London Tipton. Alex soon becomes friends with Bailey Pickett, and uses magic to bring Harper on-board. Max and Zack Martin compete against each other in many crazy challenges.

26.title: Wizards vs. Vampires on Waverly Place
26.plot: Business at the Waverly Sub Station is slow.

27.title: Wizards vs. Vampires: Tasty Bites
27.plot: Justin's new girlfriend Juliet gets the Russos to change their lifestyle.

28.title: Wizards vs. Vampires: Dream Date
28.plot: Alex continues to date Dean by using magic to enter his dreams.

29.title: Wizards & Vampires vs. Zombies
29.plot: Justin convinces Juliet that their prom date will be the most memorable.

30.title: Retest
30.plot: Jerry and his siblings, Megan and Kelbo, decide to take the infamous Wizard test again, the one that decided which of them got to keep their powers years ago, but when his children see the rivalry, they fear that it could tear their own family apart

1.title: Franken-Girl
1.plot: Justin creates a Frankenstein-type monster to keep Alex out of his room, only for it to backfire when the monster and Alex become friends.

2.title: Halloween
2.plot: The Waverly Place Merchants Association tells the Russo's that their haunted house isn't scary enough.

3.title: Monster Hunter
3.plot: Justin signs up for Monster Hunting to complete his wizard training.

4.title: Three Monsters
4.plot: Justin finds out the monsters he's searching for are Juliet and her family.

5.title: Night at the Lazerama
5.plot: Justin must track a mummy as part of his monster-hunting duties.

6.title: Doll House
6.plot: Alex shrinks herself to fit into her old doll house.

7.title: Marathoner Helper
7.plot: Harper discovers Alex helped her win many competitions.

8.title: Alex Charms a Boy
8.plot: Alex meets a cute British boy in art class named Mason Greybeck, who for some reason paints every one of his subjects as a dog... until she uses her magic to turn herself into his new artistic inspiration in an effort to make him a better artist. Meanwhile Jerry gives Justin a pair of protective goggles to help him fight the mummy that kidnapped Juliet.

9.title: Wizards vs. Werewolves
9.plot: Alex learns Mason's secret, that he's a werewolf. Justin is about to give up on his quest to find Juliet. With Masons help, the young wizards find Juliet, but Justin thinks that Mason has captured and took Alex along with him; Justin must save Alex.

10.title: Positive Alex
10.plot: Alex decides she wants to try and be positive, but when she is unable to do that herself she uses a magic marker to make sure she's positive without effort. When she loses all respect for being too positive she tries to find a balance.

11.title: Detention Election
11.plot: Justin runs for Tribeca Prep's student body president, but his alleged campaign techniques get him into trouble.

12.title: Dude Looks Like Shakira
12.plot: Uncle Kelbo turns into Shakira when he doesn't follow rules.

13.title: Eat to the Beat
13.plot: Justin has a smooth jazz band perform at the school, but Alex thinks jazz is boring and so tries to replace the jazz band with a rock band.

14.title: Third Wheel
14.plot: Harper discovers her new friend is a wizard.

15.title: The Good, the Bad, and the Alex
15.plot: Alex discovers her friend Stevie is leading a wizard revolution. To the dismay of Justin and Harper, she decides to help Stevie with her quest to make sure no wizard ever has to give up their powers again.

16.title: Western Show
16.plot: Mr. Laritate is transported to the old west!

17.title: Alex's Logo
17.plot: Alex causes controversy when she wins an award!

18.title: Dad's Buggin' Out
18.plot: Jerry is transformed into a giant bug!

19.title: Max's Secret Girlfriend
19.plot: Max gets Alex and Justin to use an aging spell, so that they can pose as his parents when he brings his new girlfriend, Nancy, home to meet the family. But after his real parents tell him honesty is the best policy, Max tells Nancy the truth- including the fact that he's a real wizard.

20.title: Alex Russo, Matchmaker?
20.plot: Alex uses magic on Harper and Zeke to create sparks!

21.title: Delinquent Justin
21.plot: Alex surprises Justin by telling him that she made a duplicate Justin and sent him off to college. Turns out his duplicate is not exactly what Justin had in mind. Meanwhile, the Russos try to be better parents.

22.title: Captain Jim Bob Sherwood
22.plot: Justin and Alex must work together on a comic book!

23.title: Wizards vs. Finkles
23.plot: Alex tries to get out of Harper's parents' act!

24.title: All About You-Niverse
24.plot: As an act of rebellion against her parents, Alex steps into a magic mirror, where she encounters a universe where everything is about her.

25.title: Uncle Ernesto
25.plot: The Russos' uncle, Ernesto, comes to visit, but has no idea that they have magic abilities. And they intend to keep it that way.

26.title: Moving On
26.plot: Harper convinces Alex to transform her into Justin's long lost vampire lover Juliet Van Heusen, in an attempt to help him overcome losing her.

27.title: Alex Saves Mason (Wizards Unleashed)
27.plot: Alex, Justin and Max discover that Mason is being held by rogue wizards.

28.title: Wizards Exposed
28.plot: The Russo family is taken into custody by a secret government agency.

locations: Hollywood Center Studios - 1040 N. Las Palmas Avenue, Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA::(studio)
imdb.plot outline: "Wizards of Waverly Place" focuses on the Russos. A typical family, which includes a mom, Theresa Russo; a dad, Jerry Russo; a son, Justin Russo; a daughter, Alex Russo; and another son, Max Russo. The kids and the family live normal lives but what their friends don't know is the kids are wizards in training and the dad was a former wizard!
imdb.title: Wizards of Waverly Place
plot: The Russo family may be an ordinary family with an average restaurant, but behind close doors, all three children must compete to be the next family wizard.

"_Wizards of Waverly Place_ (qv)" focuses on the Russos. A typical family, which includes a mom, Theresa Russo; a dad, Jerry Russo; a son, Justin Russo; a daughter, Alex Russo; and another son, Max Russo. The kids and the family live normal lives but what their friends don't know is the kids are wizards in training and the dad was a former wizard!::EMWII

The show follows the Russo family, your typical New York City family, on the surface that is. While the Russo kids try to have normal lives as teenagers they must keep a secret; they're wizards in training. They inherit their magical abilities from their dad, Jerry Russo who is also their magic teacher and a former wizard. However, there is a twist, only one child from each wizard family is allowed to keep his or her powers. When they all turn 18 the Russo children will have a family competition between siblings to decide who gets to keep their powers.::ConverseCrazy08
